game.name: Train Simulator: CN SD40-2 Wide Nose Loco Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The SD40-2W Wide Nose is a great add-on for Train Simulator players looking to expand their diesel fleet north of the border!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The SD40-2W Wide Nose is a great add-on for Train Simulator players looking to expand their diesel fleet north of the border!
